languages.text: "Тогда я поведаю, насколько черна кровь предателей".
languages.translation_comment:
Кибелла
Диалог прерывается, через затеменение РТ и остальные переносятся в соседнее помещение для суда

Кибелла
Диалог прерывается, через затеменение РТ и остальные переносятся в соседнее помещение для суда

languages.text: "Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."
languages.original_text: "Тогда я поведаю, насколько черна кровь предателей".

traits.locale_text: "Then I will tell you how dark the blood of the traitors is."
"Then I will tell you how dark the blood of the traitors is."
"Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."
"Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."
"Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."
"Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."

languages.text: « Laissez-moi vous parler du sang impie qui coule dans leurs veines. »
languages.original_text: "Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi vous parler du sang impie qui coule dans leurs veines. »

languages.text: «Entonces explicaré la sangre traicionera que corre por sus venas».
languages.original_text: "Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces explicaré la sangre traicionera que corre por sus venas».

languages.text: “那我可以向你保证，他们的血脉中流淌着奸诈的鲜血。”
languages.original_text: "Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."

traits.locale_text: “那我可以向你保证，他们的血脉中流淌着奸诈的鲜血。”

languages.text: 「それなら、彼らに流れる裏切り者の血について教えよう」
languages.original_text: "Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、彼らに流れる裏切り者の血について教えよう」

languages.text: "Dann berichte ich Euch von dem verräterischen Blut, das durch ihre Venen fließt."
languages.original_text: "Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."

traits.locale_text: "Dann berichte ich Euch von dem verräterischen Blut, das durch ihre Venen fließt."

languages.original_text: "Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."

languages.text: "O hâlde sana onların damarlarında akan hain kanı anlatayım."
languages.original_text: "Then I will tell you of the treacherous blood that runs through their veins."
